home.justice: This is a scale of humanity. Our aim is to defend the rights of the people of the world, regardless of religion, language, race, color, in the shadow of peace. The world is equal to people, people are equal to the world. If the balance is shaken and the value given to people remains light, the world will collapse on the head of the people in this balance scale. But if the value given to human then man becomes the crown of the world. Life together and humanely is happier and more meaningful with this balance.
home.hero: Everyone is equal before the universal law. We work to ensure that everyone benefits from universal human rights equally.

who-we-are.title: Who We Are?
who-we-are.description: We are a foundation founded by volunteers from various professions living in the Netherlands, supporting the rule of law, democracy and human rights.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To work for the reduction or end human rights violations committed by individuals or states in different geographies of the world.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: As human rights violations are shared with the public, the violations will decrease or come to an end.

footer_about: Silence is the worst enemy of freedom.

contact.title: Contact
contact.fill-form: Fill up the form to contact

form.email-helper: We will never share your mail.
form.message-delivered: Thank you. Your message has been delivered.
form.failed: Oops. Something went wrong, please try again.

forgot-pass-header.title: Forgot your password?
forgot-pass-header.text: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.

reset-pass-header.title: Reset your password
reset-pass-header.text: Password successfully reset. You can now log in.

matches.lowercase: Your password must contain at least one lowercase letter [a...z]
matches.uppercase: Your password must contain at least one uppercase letter [A..Z]
matches.number: Your password must contain at least one number [1,2,3...]
matches.special: Your password must contain at least one special character [(?=@...]

email-taken.title: Email is already taken
email-taken.description: You have registered this email address before. Please use the same provider as your first login

delete.title: Delete Art
delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete this art?

publish.title: Publish Art
publish.text: Are you sure you want to publish this art?

unpublish.title: Unpublish Art
unpublish.text: Are you sure you want to unpublish this art? You can always re-publish it later.

available-hours.required: You must specify number of your available hours

apply-form.heard-from: From where did you hear about us?

thanks.title: Thank you
